unnormalised: Arre yaar, mhaka hea mhoineachem electricity bill ₹3500 ailem! Pilea mhoineant tem fokot ₹2800 aslem. Mhaka mojea AC chem consumption check korunk zai astolem; tem sumar, disak 10 voram chalu asta.
normalised: Arey yaar, mhozo electricity bill hea mhoineak tin hazar panch xem rupiya ailo! Fadle mhoineak to fokot don hazar aath xem rupiya aslo. Huum, zaite mhoje A-C consumption check korunk zai; tem sumar dha voram disaak chalu asta.
